revised_title: Analysis of Magnetic Observations at Kew Observatory from 1859 to 1864
tldr: This paper analyzes the principal magnetic disturbances recorded by the horizontal and vertical force magnetometers at the Kew Observatory from 1859 to 1864. It shows a progressive decrease in the number and intensity of disturbances over the years, with a minimum in 1863, during the first half of the decennial period. The study also examines the distribution of disturbances affecting the forces in different years, months, and hours.
